all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
If you keep not my commandments, the love of the Father shall not continue with you, therefore you shall walk in darkness.
Doctrine and Covenants 95:12
Quote of the Day
"Our divine nature and covenant relationship with God entitle us to receive divine help."
Elder Sergio R. Vargas | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
